name: Low Rez Knight
description:
Not a great name, and not a completed game. I intended to do a basic zelda like with one dungeon, and intended to have a few npc's. There is a dungeon, but it's not finished at all. Just a bunch of slimes thrown in.

WASD to move

Right Control to continue text and attack.

Signs are intractable with attack.

Enjoy the "game".
